com.qti.snapdragon.sdk.digitalpen

Enum DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode>
      • com.qti.snapdragon.sdk.digitalpen.DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode>
    Enclosing class:
    DigitalPenManager

    public static enum DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode
extends java.lang.Enum<DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode>
    How the off-screen mode will operate

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DISABLED
      Input events will not be generated from off-screen pen activity, nor will side-channel listeners to DigitalPenManager.Area.OFF_SCREEN be called.
      DUPLICATE
      Off-screen input events will be mapped to the device's display, as if the device screen was duplicated.
      EXTEND
      Off-screen input events will be generated on the virtual Presentation to the side of the screen.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • EXTEND

        public static final DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode EXTEND
        Off-screen input events will be generated on the virtual Presentation to the side of the screen. See the Extended Offscreen sample for an example of how to get this handle.

        Additionally enables side-channel events via DigitalPenManager.registerSideChannelEventListener(Area, OnSideChannelDataListener) with DigitalPenManager.Area.OFF_SCREEN.

        See Also:
        android.app.Presentation

      • DUPLICATE

        public static final DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode DUPLICATE
        Off-screen input events will be mapped to the device's display, as if the device screen was duplicated.

        Additionally enables side-channel events via DigitalPenManager.registerSideChannelEventListener(Area, OnSideChannelDataListener) with DigitalPenManager.Area.OFF_SCREEN.

      • DISABLED

        public static final DigitalPenManager.OffScreenMode DISABLED
        Input events will not be generated from off-screen pen activity, nor will side-channel listeners to DigitalPenManager.Area.OFF_SCREEN be called.
